Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Mertens Peters Raes at a golf tournament in Brussels. They played a round of golf together and discussed potential business ventures, which led to a strong professional relationship.
Mertens Peters Raes is a 33 year old and comes from Belgium.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Mertens Peters Raes and Louise tied the knot in 2022. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
In 2010, Mertens graduated from Institut Saint-Louis with a secondary school diploma.
He then attended Brussels School of International Studies, which he graduated in 2015.
He pursued addtionally further eduaction by attending Thomas More University of Applied Sciences and graduating in 2018.
Occupation History:
Mertens Peters Raes is a 33 year old and comes from Belgium.
At Option NV, Mertens Peters Raes held the position of Software Developer from 2016 to 2020, developing essential skills in the field.
In 2022, he moved to Telenet Group NV to work as a Startup Founder, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 40000 EUR.
He has house located in Ieper, worth 1220000 EUR.

He purchased house in Roeselare, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 1340000 EUR.

In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 6920000 EUR from his late grandmother, a renowned Investment Banker, in 2016.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
